contentrichtext.text: This '''list of fictional dinosaurs''' is subsidiary to the [[list of fictional animals]] and is a collection of various notable dinosaur characters that appear in various works of fiction. It is limited to well-referenced examples of dinosaurs in [[literature]], [[film]], [[television]], [[comics]], [[animation]], [[video games]] and [[mythology]]. ==Film & Television == {|class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Film/Show !Notes |- |Barney |''[[Barney And Friends]]'' |Also known as Barney The Friendly/Purple Dinosaur, He's a [[Tyrannosaurus Rex]] |- |Baby Bop |''[[Barney And Friends]]'' |A three-year old green [[Triceratops]] |- |B.J. |''[[Barney And Friends]]'' |A seven-year-old yellow [[Protoceratops]] |- |[[Godzilla]] |''[[Godzilla]]'' |Also known as Godzillasaurus or King of the Monsters |- |[[Gorosaurus]] |''[[King Kong Escapes]]'' | |- |[[Paleosaurus]] |''[[Behemoth, the Sea Monster]]'' |A prehistoric gargantuan dinosaur saturated by radiation. |- |[[Rhedosaurus]] |''[[The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms]]'' |A frozen carnivore unleashed from the Arctic by a nuclear bomb test. |- |Riff |''[[Barney And Friends]]'' |An orange six-year-old [[Saurolophus]] |- |[[Titanosaurus (Godzilla)|Titanosaurus]] |'' [[Terror of Mechagodzilla]]'' | |- |[[Yonggary]] |'' [[Reptilian (film)|Reptilian]]'' | |} ==Animation== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Show !Notes |- |[[Bob the Dinosaur|Bob]] |''[[Dilbert (TV series)]]'' |Vegetarian dinosaur, who was found hiding behind Dilbert's couch. |- |[[Denver, the Last Dinosaur|Denver]] |''[[Denver, the Last Dinosaur]]'' |Released from a preserved egg in 1988 [[California]] |- |[[Dink, the Little Dinosaur|Dink]] |''[[Dink, the Little Dinosaur]]'' |A nice, brave and smart [[Apatosaurus]], who has a strong bond with his friends. |- |[[Dino (The Flintstones)|Dino]] |''[[The Flintstones]]'' |Imbued with the characteristics of a pet canine. |- |[[Gertie the Dinosaur]] |''[[Gertie the Dinosaur|Gertie the Dinosaur (1914)]]'' |Brontosaurus smiles and interacts with animator Winsor McCay |- |[[Reptar]] |''[[Rugrats]]'' |Main character of the babies' favourite TV Show. it was based on [[Godzilla]]. |- |[[List of Toy Story characters#Rex|Rex]] |''[[Toy Story]]'' |An excitable large, green, plastic [[Tyrannosaurus rex]] who suffers from anxiety, an inferiority complex and the concern that he is not scary enough. Voiced by [[Wallace Shawn]]. |- |[[We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story (film)#Voice cast|Rex]] |[[We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story (film)|We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story]] |An intelligent Orange [[Tyrannosaurus Rex]] who ceases to become a ravaging dinosaur. Voiced by [[John Goodman]]. |- |[[The Terrible Thunderlizards|Thunderlizards]] |''[[The Terrible Thunderlizards]]'', [[Eek! The Cat]] |A trio of operatives consisting of Doc Tari a [[Parasaurolophus]], Kutter a [[Styracosaurus]] and Squat a [[Allosaurus]] who make numerous attempts to exterminate humans. |} ==Video games== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Game !Notes |- |[[Alex (Tekken)|Alex]] |''[[Tekken (series)|Tekken]]'' |Velociraptor |- |[[Birdo]] |''[[Super Mario Bros. 2]]'' |Character of the Mario universe. |- |[[List of characters in the Star Fox series#Prince Tricky|Tricky]] |''[[Star Fox (series)|Star Fox]]'' |Prince of dinosaurs. |- |[[Red Earth (video game)#Hauzer|Hauzer]] |''[[Red Earth (video game)|Red Earth]]'' |A fossil from Savalia, but resurrected by Scion. |- |''Novaraptor'' |''[[Primal Carnage]]'' |A fictional species created by combining the genetics of multiple dromaeosaur species. |- |Radical Rex |''[[Radical Rex]]'' |A skateboarding, fire-breathing [[Tyrannosaurus rex]]. |- |[[Tyranitar]] |''[[Pokémon]]'' |A powerful, [[Godzilla]]-like creature with the ability to destroy the landscape. |- |[[Groudon]] |''[[Pokémon]]'' |A red therapod, representing the [[Behemoth]] in the ''Pokémon'' universe. |- |[[Cranidos]] and [[Rampardos]] |''[[Pokémon]]'' |Pachycephalosaurs revived from fossils. |- |[[Shieldon]] and [[Bastiodon]] |''[[Pokémon]]'' |Ceratopsians revived from fossils. |- |[[Yoshi]] |''[[Super Mario World]]'' |Acts as Mario's steed and can swallow items and weak enemies. |} ==Mythology== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Notes |- |[[Mbielu-Mbielu-Mbielu]] |(African) believed to be a [[Kentrosaurus]] |- |[[Muhuru (cryptid)|Muhuru]] |(African) white [[stegosaurus]] |- |[[Mokele-mbembe]] |(African) bears a resemblance to [[Sauropods]] |- |[[Ngoubou]] |(African) [[Ceratopsian]]-like cryptid |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *A list of [http://www.dinosauria.com/jdp/misc/fiction.htm Dinosaurs in Science Fiction Literature], by Michael Brett-Surman. {{Fictional biology navbox}} [[Category:Lists of fictional animals by type|Dinosaurs]] [[Category:Lists of fictional reptiles and amphibians|Dinosaurs]] [[Category:Fictional dinosaurs|*]] [[Category:Dinosaur-related lists|Fictional]]
